courses.name: Machine Learning Data -Science in Python & R

projects.shortDescription: Designed and implemented a deep learning -based healthcare system utilizing CNN and Gradient Boosting, achieving 92% accuracy in early disease and mental health prediction. Integrated a Decision Tree model for patient risk assessment, enhancing risk stratification with 87% precision . Developed an interactive chatbot using LangChain and LLM , reducing patient query resolution time by 40% and boosting engagement.

projects.projectTitle: RAG -Based Knowledge Graph System using Neo4j and LangChain
projects.shortDescription: Built a Retrieval -Augmented Generation (RAG) framework incorporating Neo4j for structured knowledge representation and LangChain for advanced query handling. Optimized retrieval accuracy to 85% by leveraging graph -based reasoning and LLMs for contextual responses. Enhanced document retrieval speed by 40%, ensuring highly relevant AI -generated answers.

projects.projectTitle: AI-Driven Semantic Retrieval for Clinical Trials
projects.shortDescription: Engineered an AI-driven retrieval system processing 450K+ clinical trials using the E5 Large Instruct model (achieving 76.81 MTEB score ) for high -fidelity embeddings. Achieved 40% faster retrieval with FAISS , enhancing precision compared to traditional keyword -based search methods. Reduced operational costs by leveraging a fully open -source stack for scalable and efficient deployment.

Developed a resume builder application using Streamlit and LangChain, enabling users to create personalized resumes with AI-generated content. Integrated a user-friendly interface for seamless customization and download options.
